item.title: Davide's Code and Architecture Notes - Software Architecture vs Software Design
item.description: Software Architecture and Software Design are terms that look similar but refer to two totally different aspects of software. Letâ€™s find the differences and their purposes. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/architecture-notes/software-architecture-vs-software-design/
